src_original: hrasvaṃ vā āśvasan dīrghaṃ vā,  āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |

dīrghaṃ vā praśvasan dīrghaṃ praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |  hrasvamāśvasan hrasvamāśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |  hrasvaṃ vā praśvasan hrasvaṃ praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |  kāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasan kāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |  kāyapratisaṃvedī praśvasan kāyapratisaṃvedī praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasan kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |  kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasan kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī vā praśvasan yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
